title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Biden proposes $6 trillion-plus spending spree. Rush: You can't compete with Santa Claus. Senator Tim Scott delivers GOP response. Rush: The Great Society wasn't so great. Biden wants to sacrifice more jobs to Green New Deal. Q1 GDP of 6.5%, masks inflation. Rush nukes Biden's tired old line on the rich not paying their "fair share". Leftists smear Tim Scott again as they have in the past, Rush defends him. Callers react to Biden's speech. James Golden, aka Bo Snerdley, hosts a new podcast, Rush Limbaugh: The Man Behind the Golden EIB Microphone, debuting May 12th.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Democrat racists on trend on Twitter, calling Senator Tim Scott "Uncle Tim". Scott disputes Biden's claim that the Georgia voting law is Jim Crow. Biden declares that America is a systemically racist nation. Rush provides evidence that America's got heart. Biden promises "green jobs", Rush nukes the concept. More caller response to the Biden and Scott speeches. Tim Scott on the Georgia law. Biden calls January 6th the greatest attack on democracy since the Civil War. Biden gave speech to socially distanced, mostly empty House chamber, even though everyone is vaccinated. Rush on Biden's car rallies and press conferences with reporters in little circles. James Golden podcast.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Biden saddles Harris with border crisis. Rush reminds us that Trump fixed the problem at the border, even without finishing the wall. Biden goes easy on China. Harris this morning says America isn't a racist country, but... Biden on systemic racism. Callers on Biden's speech. The day Rush discovered from a caller that Democrats had captured single women voters by offering endless programs and freebies. A story about an old bird. Rush loved pelicans. James Golden on his new podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
